question: Information Collection and Use
answer: Our website uses third-party vendors, including Google, that employ cookies to serve ads based on users' prior visits to our website and other websites on the Internet. These cookies allow these vendors to collect information about users' preferences and tailor advertisements to their interests. Google's use of advertising cookies enables both Google and its partners to deliver personalized ads to users based on their visits to our website and/or other sites on the Internet. Users' personal information is not shared with us, but rather used by these third-party vendors to optimize ad content for the individual user.

question: Opting Out of Personalized Advertising
answer: Users have the option to opt out of personalized advertising served by Google by visiting the Ads Setting page. It's important to note that opting out of personalized advertising does not mean users will no longer see advertisements; rather, the ads displayed will be less tailored to individual interests

question: Changes to this Privacy Policy
answer: We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time. Any modifications will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage users to check this page regularly for any updates.
